Help Us Help you!  Attend the Developer Relationship Meeting with Myself and our Marketing Dept. tomorrow at 9:00am Pacific Time. 

For the agenda and Dial in info
https://wiki.hyperledger.org/display/Marketing/2020-01-15+Meeting+notes

Calling all Projects, SIG, and WG!!!  We will have a Video recording Studio setup at HGF (Hyperledger Global Forum). We are asking that all projects and groups help us create a 5 minute video about your group so that we can promote it afterward. Sign up Here!
https://wiki.hyperledger.org/display/HGF/Video+Recording+Schedule

The Linux Foundation’s CommunityBridge engineers are working on a tool to measure the health of critical open source projects and one of the key areas identified is QA Testing.  They request that our communities provide  honest and detailed information on testing tools and methodologies you use in your projects for us to come up with a detailed analysis, which they will share with all respondents and projects. https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/9H5G2GV. It’s only 5 questions long.

Hello everyone - is this group still active?
@dimitar.ivanov -- the group hasn't been active lately although there are plans to reactivate it soon.  did you have questions?
Hello @davidwboswell Thank you for your feedback. I have many questions since this area is very interesting for me and my company. When do you expect to "restart" the activity?

@dimitar.ivanov -- things should be rebooting in october.  you would be welcome to post to the group's mailing list -- there are more people there than in this chat channel.  the list is at: https://lists.hyperledger.org/g/education-architecture-sig  -- having you post there will be a good way to start reactivating things.
@dimitar.ivanov @davidwboswell I am also interested to reactivating, as my compa
* as my company also work in education domain and want to be part of this group

@knagware9 -- that's great.  i'm glad to hear you're interested in reactivating the group too.  i would encourage both of you to sign up to the group's list, introduce yourself and talk about your interest in the group.  getting conversations going there again will be a good next step in rebooting the group.
@davidwboswell  Okay Thanks...I will start the conversation in the group
Has joined the channel.

Hi, 
I am Darshana Jain, CEO, Snapper Future Tech.
Our company is creating hyperledger based products in the Education domain.
I am keen to restart activity on this group and brainstorm, collaborate and engage with like minded companies, people.
 
Learning Credential platforms are trending, there are several companies building these solutions.
There are standards being proposed for Blockchain in Education in Europe. I Would love to have views  on this.

The other business domains with the hyper ledger SIG which have created / working on setting standards.

Lets work together towards creating Global standards for Blockchain in Education.
I am happy to volunteer time to lead the effort in this domain.

msg: @DPJ -- thanks for reaching out here and on the list and thank you for helping to reactivate the discussion around using blockchain in the education space.  i'm looking forward to continuing this discussion with other community members and seeing how the community wants to collaborate around this topic.
Has joined the channel.
Hello everyone, just joining in this chat to learn more about the work of this SIG and see if there is any way I can add value and contribute.

Prior to joining the blockchain industry 5 years ago, I worked in the education sector / lifelong learning in the UK, managing high value contracts from a number of UK agencies and the EU to up skill the workforce and increase social mobility through education. The area of education and blockchain are very dear to me, and I would welcome any information you may have of existing applications being built on Hyperledger (or even any other protocol) that will apply to this industry. Thanks a lot, looking forward to a conversation with you all.
As a quick introduction, I work as Director of Sales and Marketing at Chainstack (https://chainstack.com/) - managed blockchain services.
